# Error Component

### Error

**Exports:**
- `Error` - Error display component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Error } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<Error>
    This email address is already in use.
</Error>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/error for full documentation and examples.
